reviewText: Big fan of AlanRickman for many years.  I wish ithe interview had been longer.

This interview was very good.  The viewer got a chance to see into the mind of Alan Rickman.  He is as eloquent in the interview as if he were onstage or in a movie role. This interview was a great way to see what the man is like as opposed to him playing a role.  I would recommend seeing this interview.
This truly the best Charlie Rose tape I have ever watched. Would recommend it to all my friends.
